com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class Buttons

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.Buttons

  • public class Buttons
extends Object
    Button utilities. Buttons all around this development system are expected to have properties set in the user data, properties like the button group, the order in the group, or any useful property to handle the action.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • button

        public static javafx.scene.control.Button button(String id,
                                                 String text,
                                                 boolean defaultButton,

                                                 boolean close)
        Return the button.
        Parameters:
        id - The button id.
        text - The text.
        defaultButton - A boolean.
        cancelButton - A boolean.
        close - A boolean to force close the window.
        Returns:
        The button.
